data.title: Braceface
data.meta_description: Fourteen-year-old Sharon Spitz wants to hang out with her friends, play with her pets, and survive her first year of high school. But an accident at tâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Brace Yourself

Sharon's confidence plunges when she gets her braces attached. Will Alden still want to go to the dance with her now that she's a metal mouth?

21 min Â· Aug 20, 2019 TV-G

EPISODE 2

Crushed

When Connor's appearance is radically transformed for the better after a session of acupuncture, Sharon has to question her new attraction to him.

21 min Â· Aug 20, 2019 TV-G

EPISODE 3

5 Things That Really Bug Me About You

When Sharon's braces open the lock to Maria's diary she can't help but read the private entries.

21 min Â· Aug 20, 2019 TV-G

EPISODE 4

The Doctor Is In

When Nina hires Dr. Spitz as her own personal therapist, Sharon feels misplaced and jealous.

21 min Â· Aug 20, 2019 TV-G

EPISODE 5

The Meat of the Matter

Alden gets Sharon an opportunity to work with him at a part-time job, Sharon learns more than she wanted to know about the meat packing business.

21 min Â· Aug 20, 2019 TV-G
